subject: Basketball
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: The Sun Devils loss to U.S.C. in the quarterfinals of the Pac-10 came after a whistle and some free throws, the latest in a series of controversial endings focused on officiating.
snippet: The Sun Devils loss to U.S.C. in the quarterfinals of the Pac-10 came after a whistle and some free throws, the latest in a series of controversial endings focused on officiating.
